review: It does just as advertised. Easy install and add-on works great. Highly recomend

review: Meets all my expectations and even surpasses them in some areas.
author: Patrick Smith

review: Not too bad. It doing its job. Wish it had more apps I want.
author: Dario Lamour

review: Works OK, seems to get stuck tween programs at times.
author: christopher whittle

review: I ordered the Fire TV Stick because it is compatible with SlingTV, and my PS3 and smartTv were not. With that being said I have really enjoyed it, it works smoothly, it was very easy to set up, I love the fact it has a control, and it gives me the flexibility to switch from TV to TV. I have never used a Chromecast , have little exposure to Roku, so I wouldn't be able to give a fair comparison. I would reccomend the FireTv Stick to anyone who is looking to purchase one.
author: RickyG
